analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x4e9bd665df9ac73ea959ba2ae729e306c9354bdf.sol:
	Contract LinkCrypts has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x4e9bd665df9ac73ea959ba2ae729e306c9354bdf.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x4e9bd665df9ac73ea959ba2ae729e306c9354bdf.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
